memory: host=1024, guest=1024
romimage: file="/usr/share/ovmf/ovmf_x64.bin"
vgaromimage: file="/usr/share/bochs/VGABIOS-lgpl-latest-cirrus"
boot: disk, cdrom, floppy
floppy_bootsig_check: disabled=0
# no floppya
# no floppyb
ata0: enabled=1, ioaddr1=0x1f0, ioaddr2=0x3f0, irq=14
ata0-master: type=disk, path="output/bootimage.img", mode=flat, cylinders=0, heads=16, spt=63, model="Generic 1234", biosdetect=auto, translation=auto
ata0-slave: type=none
ata1: enabled=1, ioaddr1=0x170, ioaddr2=0x370, irq=15
ata1-master: type=none
ata1-slave: type=none
ata2: enabled=0
ata3: enabled=0
pci: enabled=1, chipset=i440fx, slot1=cirrus
vga: extension=cirrus, update_freq=5, realtime=1
cpu: count=1:1:1, ips=95000000, quantum=16, model=zambezi, reset_on_triple_fault=0, cpuid_limit_winnt=0, ignore_bad_msrs=1, mwait_is_nop=0
print_timestamps: enabled=0
debugger_log: -
magic_break: enabled=0
port_e9_hack: enabled=0
private_colormap: enabled=0
clock: sync=slowdown, time0=utc, rtc_sync=0
# no cmosimage
# no loader
log: -
logprefix: %t%e%d
debug: action=ignore
info: action=report
error: action=report
panic: action=ask
